document.full_text: a woman has filed suit against frito-lay and costco for at least $50,000, charging that the ruffles potato chips she ate contained some objects such as straight pins or needles that led her into surgery.
document.title: frito-lay sued over alleged metal objects in chips
lines_and_colors: a woman has filed suit against frito-lay and costco for at least $50,000, charging that the ruffles potato chips she ate contained some objects such as straight pins or needles that led her into surgery.
